thread.title: Partnering could be DoD's path to advance technology faster
thread.title_full: Partnering could be DoD's path to advance technology faster

title: Partnering could be DoD's path to advance technology faster
text:
14 Partnering could be DoD's path to advance technology faster 
Federal Times: The potential benefits of private partnerships are a hot topic in DoD, even though the benefits have so far only been realized on a smaller scale."I think that there's clearly leadership alignment around recognizing that we need to do a better job of partnering," said Shelby Mounts, a Navy captain and service representative for the Defense Business Board.
